successes.title: Boss Monster: The Next Level
successes.description: Become a Boss and crush puny heroes in this sequel to the hit card game! This 160-card set is playable on its own or as an expansion.

Pledges.description: THE NEXT LEVEL: Take your Boss Monster game to the next level with this full-sized standalone expansion of 160 completely new cards. FREE SHIPPING within the United States ($8 extra shipping to Canada; $15 extra rest of the world).

THE NEXT LEVEL - LIMITED EDITION: We're doing only one printing of this limited edition version of Boss Monster 2: The Next Level. You'll get The Next Level in a unique box sleeve created by artist Darren Calvert and with an added bonus of all 12 Next Level bosses in Holofoil card form!  FREE SHIPPING within the United States ($8 extra shipping to Canada; $15 extra rest of the world).

THE COLLECTOR BOX: Boss Monster is going on the road! The Collector Box includes a copy of Boss Monster 2 (Limited Edition version), shipping in June. Later in the year, we'll also ship you our new Carrying Case AND the Portable Pack: new cards that take Boss Monster into the world of retro portable gaming! Free shipping in the U.S. ($16 extra shipping to Canada; $30 extra rest of the world).
